languages.text: "Подвижник {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} способен перенести великие телесные истязания без утраты функциональности. Но там, где выстоит укрепленная священным железом плоть, может сгинуть чистота духа".

traits.locale_text: "Подвижник {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} способен перенести великие телесные истязания без утраты функциональности. Но там, где выстоит укрепленная священным железом плоть, может сгинуть чистота духа".

languages.text: "A devotee of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} is capable of withstanding great bodily torment with no loss of functionality. But where flesh reinforced with sacred iron will persevere, the purity of spirit may perish."
languages.original_text: "Подвижник {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} способен перенести великие телесные истязания без утраты функциональности. Но там, где выстоит укрепленная священным железом плоть, может сгинуть чистота духа".

languages.text: "Ein Anhänger des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} kann große körperliche Qualen erleiden, ohne an Funktionalität zu verlieren. Obwohl durch heiliges Eisen verstärktes Fleisch jedoch überdauert, kann die Reinheit des Geistes absterben."
languages.original_text: "A devotee of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} is capable of withstanding great bodily torment with no loss of functionality. But where flesh reinforced with sacred iron will persevere, the purity of spirit may perish."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Anhänger des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} kann große körperliche Qualen erleiden, ohne an Funktionalität zu verlieren. Obwohl durch heiliges Eisen verstärktes Fleisch jedoch überdauert, kann die Reinheit des Geistes absterben."

languages.text: « Les fidèles de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} sont capables de résister à de terribles tourments physiques sans perte de fonctionnalités, mais contrairement à la chair renforcée de fer sacré... la pureté spirituelle peut, elle, capituler et périr. »
languages.original_text: "A devotee of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} is capable of withstanding great bodily torment with no loss of functionality. But where flesh reinforced with sacred iron will persevere, the purity of spirit may perish."

traits.locale_text: « Les fidèles de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} sont capables de résister à de terribles tourments physiques sans perte de fonctionnalités, mais contrairement à la chair renforcée de fer sacré... la pureté spirituelle peut, elle, capituler et périr. »

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的信徒可以承受残酷的肉体折磨，不会丧失生体机能。然而，圣铁只能保护肉体，却无法保护灵魂的纯洁。”
languages.original_text: "A devotee of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} is capable of withstanding great bodily torment with no loss of functionality. But where flesh reinforced with sacred iron will persevere, the purity of spirit may perish."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的信徒可以承受残酷的肉体折磨，不会丧失生体机能。然而，圣铁只能保护肉体，却无法保护灵魂的纯洁。”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の信者は、機能を傷つけず、激しい身体への拷問に耐えることができる。しかし、神聖なる鉄で強化された肉体が耐えたところで、清い心は死んでいくかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "A devotee of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} is capable of withstanding great bodily torment with no loss of functionality. But where flesh reinforced with sacred iron will persevere, the purity of spirit may perish."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の信者は、機能を傷つけず、激しい身体への拷問に耐えることができる。しかし、神聖なる鉄で強化された肉体が耐えたところで、清い心は死んでいくかもしれない」

languages.text: «Un devoto del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} es capaz de soportar grandes tormentos corporales sin pérdida de funcionalidad. Pero donde la carne reforzada con hierro sagrado perdura, la pureza de espíritu puede perecer».
languages.original_text: "A devotee of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} is capable of withstanding great bodily torment with no loss of functionality. But where flesh reinforced with sacred iron will persevere, the purity of spirit may perish."

traits.locale_text: «Un devoto del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} es capaz de soportar grandes tormentos corporales sin pérdida de funcionalidad. Pero donde la carne reforzada con hierro sagrado perdura, la pureza de espíritu puede perecer».

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} sadık inananları, işlevselliklerini yitirmeden en ağır bedensel eziyetlere dayanma gücüne sahiptir. Lakin kutsal demirle takviye edilmiş bedenin sebat ettiği yerde ruhun saflığı zevale erebilir."
languages.original_text: "A devotee of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} is capable of withstanding great bodily torment with no loss of functionality. But where flesh reinforced with sacred iron will persevere, the purity of spirit may perish."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in sadık inananları, işlevselliklerini yitirmeden en ağır bedensel eziyetlere dayanma gücüne sahiptir. Kutsal demirle güçlendirilmiş etleri dayanabilir lakin ruhlarının saflığı zevale erebilir."
